Address.value: 21300 VICTORY BOULEVARD,12TH FLOOR, WOODLAND HILLS, California, 91367, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BlackLine is a provider of financial and accounting software. The company's products, which help support and automate accounting and financial workflows, include financial close, account reconciliation, intercompany accounting, and control assurance. BlackLine's software seeks to improve the dependability of its clients' financial reporting. BlackLine was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Los Angeles.
